alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 14 at 7:25PM CDT until March 14 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 725 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Whitesboro, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Whitesboro, Pottsboro, Bells, Savoy, Knollwood, Dorchester, southeastern Lake Texoma, Southmayd, Sadler and Luella. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
